body: When did banning guilds on a censorship free website become a 1A question?

guild.description:
We track and discuss banned, privated, and quarantined Ruqqus guilds, Reddit subreddits, and saidit communities.

We are not a hub for banned communities to congregate, nor do we endorse the creation of alternate communities to banned or quarantined ones.

Rules:
 - Follow Ruqqus ToS
 - Follow posting format (titles must refer to the name of the guild, subreddit, community of interest that is either of the following: banned, quarantined, or privated; image or description must contain proof of the event)
 - No reposts allowed.

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
Discussion: 

* https://ruqqus.com/post/2p3e/democracy-should-pedophileactivism-have-been-banned
* https://ruqqus.com/post/2oqh/thank-you-ruqqus-mods
* https://ruqqus.com/post/2oqj/admins-ban-guild-in-favor-of

Note that most ruqqies support this ban. I don't know what type of content the guild had, but if it was protected speech, I'd probably oppose the ban.

Also, unremoved posts from banned guilds [still show up in search results](https://web.archive.org/web/20200827182700/https://ruqqus.com/search?q=pedophileactivism) (I almost thought it was unbanned).

![](https://i.ibb.co/MR5FfzB/sfrohne.png)
body_html:
Discussion:

  • https://ruqqus.com/post/2p3e/democracy-should-pedophileactivism-have-been-banned
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/2oqh/thank-you-ruqqus-mods
  • https://ruqqus.com/post/2oqj/admins-ban-guild-in-favor-of

Note that most ruqqies support this ban. I don't know what type of content the guild had, but if it was protected speech, I'd probably oppose the ban.

Also, unremoved posts from banned guilds still show up in search results (I almost thought it was unbanned).

body: Ruqqus admins say they try their hardest to allow as much 1A-protected speech as possible. Some speech isn't allowed for reasons such as ruqqus's hosting provider's TOS banning advocation for pedophilia

body:
>Ruqqus admins say they try their hardest

![](https://files.catbox.moe/37h68f.jpg)

So it's not Ruqqus's idea of freedom of speech we need to abide by, it's their server host's.
